title: CLEAR_PED_TASKS_IMMEDIATELY
content:
0xBC045625// ClearPedTasksImmediately
void CLEAR_PED_TASKS_IMMEDIATELY(Ped ped);Parameters:ped: Ped id.Immediately stops the pedestrian from whatever it's doing. The difference between this and CLEAR_PED_TASKS is that this one teleports the ped but does not change the position of the ped.This is the server-side RPC native equivalent of the client native CLEAR_PED_TASKS_IMMEDIATELY.
